job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Remote, Full Time
job.description: Spreetail is an ecommerce company that connects brands with customers wherever they love to shop online We delight our customers every day by putting our technology marketing and supply chain to work for them behind the scenes Born and raised in Lincoln Nebraska Spreetail has grown into offices and fulfillment centers in 8 cities across 6 statesbrbrSpreetails Software team known internally as Toolkit consists of Engineering Product Management and User Experience This team builds a completely homegrown software to compete against top players in the ecommerce industry The software controls our business from beginning to end ordering marketing inventory customer service and accounting We use the latest and greatest libraries and development methodologies to build elegant solutions to complex realworld problemsbrbrstrongThis role is 100 remotebrstrongulliIn order to qualify for remote work candidates need to reside or be willing to move to TexasbrliulstronguAs a Machine Learning Engineer You WillbrustrongulliCreate machine learning analytical models and algorithms using performance monitoring and running tests and experiments as requiredliliDevelop software that can be monitored analyzed and optimized for forecast delivery through tools APIs and dashboardsliliBuild out our adaptive learning capabilities and algorithms in conjunction with data scientists liliCollaborate and maintain relationships with other engineers throughout Spreetail to continually deliver and improve our software solutionsliliBreak down complex models and deliverables into smaller components and tasksliliIncrease the quality of new and existing software systemsliliUncover and deliver new data sources through API Batch and Scraping technologiesbrliulstronguWho You ArebrustrongulliA positive individual who shows optimism and someone others want to work with liliOpen to giving feedback on individual skillsets designs and code to constantly improve yourself and our solutionsliliSupportive collaborative and grow with everyoneliliA continuous learner of machine learning eCommerce and data sources available to improve forecasting modelsliliAttentive to detail and focus on the quality of your designs models and softwareliliHandson with development projects and tooling that impact all software teamsliliCollaborative with other engineers delivery managers product managers and analysts on software development projectsbrliulstronguBenefitsbrustrongulliUnit Appreciation Rights Up to 5 of yearly salary based upon company and team performanceliliCompany Bonus Up to 5 of yearly salary based upon company and team performanceliliHealth Insurance Spreetail offers two plansliliAetna PPO Spreetail covers 100 of premiums for employees and 50 for your spouse and dependents included on the planliliAetna HDHP HSA Plan Spreetail will contribute 500 to an HSA for an employeeonly plan or 1000 for your spouse and dependents included on the planliliDental Insurance Spreetail will pay half of the dental coverage for youspousefamily planslili 401k Spreetail partners with ForUsAll to provide the opportunity to invest in your future with pretax and posttax plan optionsliliPaid Time Off untracked time offliliWedding Week Enjoy an additional 5 paid days off before or after your weddingliliCreating a Home After 2 years of employment Spreetail will give you 5000 when you buy a homeliliYear 3 Vacation After 3 years of employment you will be eligible for an allinclusive vacationliliYear 5 Sabbatical After 5 years of employment you will be eligible for a 2week paid sabbaticalliliDonation Matching Spreetail will match your donation dollar for dollar up to 250 abrliulyear and up to 1000 if youve been here for 5 yearsbrulliCommunity Involvement Spreetail encourages employees to take time off for volunteer opportunities throughout the year including a semiannual volunteer week in every community we serveliliProduct Discount Enjoy a 20 discount on the products we sellbrliulstrongEqual Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongSpreetail is an equal opportunity employer that hires based on stellar qualifications positive attitude and exemplary work ethic rather than factors like age gender identity race nationality religion or sexuality
